MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.10am due to safety concerns at Cumnock substation and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:42pm on Friday, 23 April 2021
